tests.testSummary: This test ensures that the server's configurations contains the values required by the specifications, backchannel_logout_supported, backchannel_logout_session_supported and end_session_endpoint. Certification for this profile requires that backchannel logout session (i.e. 'sid' in the id_token/logout token) is supported.

This test performs a normal authorization flow at the OP, then sends the user to the end_session_endpoint. It validates the OP correctly calls the backchannel_logout_uri and sends the user to the post_logout_redirect_uri, then tries another authentication with prompt=none which must return an error (as the user has been logged out).

If using static client registration you must register backchannel_logout_uri to the same url as the redirect url, but replacing the portion after the alias with /backchannel_logout and similarly register /post_logout_redirect as a post_logout_redirect_uri.
